src:
Lagi, Manchester United Blokir Transfer Marcos Rojo
05 Nov 2019, 08:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Marcos Rojo memang bukan pemain utama di lini pertahanan Manchester United pada musim 2019/2020 ini. Akan tetapi, Setan Merah ngotot tidak ingin melepasnya. United disebut memblokir rencana kepindahan Marcos Rojo.
Marcos Rojo merupakan salah satu pemain dengan masa bakti panjang di skuat United. Pemain asal Argentina sudah berada di Old Trafford sejak tahun 2014 lalu.
Ketika itu, United harus membayar 20 juta euro untuk bisa mendapat jasa Marcos Rojo dari Sporting Lisbon. Harga mahal, untuk ukuran tahun tersebut, mampu dibalas performa apik Marcos Rojo di pertahanan United.
Akan tetapi, sejak tahun 2017, performa Marcos Rojo menurun drastis. Dia mulai sering mendapat cedera dan sulit menemukan bentuk permainan terbaiknya. Marcos Rojo lebih sering duduk di bangku cadangan.
text:
Again, Manchester United Block Transfer Marcos Rojo
05 Nov 2019, 08:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Marcos Rojo is not the main player in Manchester United's defense in this 2019/2020 season. However, the Red Devils insisted not to let go. United called blocking Marcos Rojo's transfer plan.
Marcos Rojo is one of the players with a long service period in United's squad. The Argentine has been at Old Trafford since 2014.
At that time, United had to pay 20 million euros to be able to get the services of Marcos Rojo from Sporting Lisbon. Expensive price, for the size of the year, Marcos Rojo's slick performance in United's defense can be returned.
However, since 2017, Marcos Rojo's performance has declined dramatically. He began to get injured often and it was difficult to find the best form of play. Marcos Rojo sat on the bench more often.
